story_teamrocket_01_02000/2401_1201_0200:
Unfortunately, I have some bad news... It appears
Team Rocket is up to no good again!
story_teamrocket_01_02000/2401_1201_0400:
You mean that group that used Pokémon to carry
out their evil plots in Kanto and Johto?
story_teamrocket_01_02000/2401_1201_0500:
Precisely. Red noticed they were becoming more
active lately and went to investigate what’s
going on...
story_teamrocket_01_02000/2401_1201_0600:
but we haven’t heard from him for three
days now.
story_teamrocket_01_02000/2401_1201_0700: Oh no... I hope he’s OK!
story_teamrocket_01_02000/2401_1201_0800: D’you think Team Rocket might have hurt him?
story_teamrocket_01_02000/2401_1201_0900:
Heh, as if! Those pip-squeaks don’t stand a
chance against Red.
story_teamrocket_01_02000/2401_1201_1000:
First of all, he’s my rival! And he’s also the one
who dismantled them the first time by taking down
their boss!
story_teamrocket_01_02000/2401_1201_1100:
I guess you’re right... If anyone could handle them,
it’d be Red!
story_teamrocket_01_02000/2401_1201_1200:
Yeah. Also, I’M gonna be the first to break Red’s
winning streak. If anyone else wants a shot at
that, they’re gonna have to wait their turn!
story_teamrocket_01_02000/2401_1201_1300:
Yes, Red is strong... But we can’t forget that he
still hasn’t come back.
story_teamrocket_01_02000/2401_1201_1400:
All things considered, I think we should make our
next move now.
story_teamrocket_01_02000/2401_1201_1500:
I’ve already contacted Gym Leaders and members
of the Elite Four to help us out.
story_teamrocket_01_02000/2401_1201_1700:
Thank you, Lillie, but it’s dangerous to go alone.
Why don’t we form a team?
story_teamrocket_01_02000/2401_1201_1800:
We’d also appreciate your help,
[Name:PlayerNickname ] and Paulo!
story_teamrocket_01_02000/2401_1201_1900:
Will you help us find Team Rocket’s hideout here
on Pasio?
story_teamrocket_01_02000/2401_0401_2100: Arigato! I had a feeling you’d say yes!
story_teamrocket_01_02000/2401_0402_2300:
*chuckle*
Wonderful! I knew we could count on you!
story_teamrocket_01_02000/2401_1201_2400:
Then here’s the plan! Blue, Lillie, Paulo, and 
[Name:PlayerNickname ] will work as a team!
story_teamrocket_01_02000/2401_1201_2600:
Thanks, everyone. Dragonite and I will do
a sweep from above.
story_teamrocket_01_02000/2401_1201_2700: Sounds good! You can leave the rest to us!
story_teamrocket_01_02000/2401_1201_2900:
These Rockets can be a nasty bunch. No biting off
more than you can chew, you hear me?
story_teamrocket_01_02000/2401_1201_3000:
Well, you wouldn’t have to worry, anyway.
Aerodactyl and I will protect you guys no
matter what!
story_teamrocket_01_02000/2401_0401_3200: That’s what I like to hear!
story_teamrocket_01_02000/2401_0402_3400: Sounds like you’re pumped up and ready to go!
story_teamrocket_01_02000/2401_1201_3500: Time to head out, then! Let’s get this ball rolling!
